maqras.text: Tha Sin Mim Tuhan nyang teupeue meukeusud ayat Sabab Hadharat hana Neupeugah
Nyoekeuh dum ayat di dalam kitab Qur’an nyoe meuhat cit trang sileupah
Sang-sang digata gadoh seumangat Watee taingat jipeubuet salah Pakon jih batat han jimeuiman
Sabe sit meunan dum kaphe jadah Meu Kamoe kheundak Meupeutron ayat Saboh muʻjizat nyang hebat leupah Sideh di langet Meupeutron ayat Mangat jih teupat jiteukui bagah
Beurangpeue ayat teuka lom bak jih Teutap sit dijih hana jipapah Ayat nyang baro teuka bak Tuhan Han jipeureumeun jipaleng bagah
Ka jikheun sulet han jitem pateh Dudoe bak droejih teuma geupeugah Bandum geubalah teuma nyan dijih Nyang jipeu-eleh jikheun beurakah
Peue hana jieu di dalam bumoe Bak kayee sinoe hijo dum indah Kamoe peuudep dumna tanaman Meupasang-pasang galakteuh leupah
Bandum atra nyan sit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Maha Peumurah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Dijih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Watee Neumeuhei uleh Po gata b4 Tajak hai Musa keudeh talangkah 4 Kaom nyang lalem kaphe keu Tuhan
Kaom Peuraʻeun nyang that seurakah Pakon bandum jih han jitakwa
Geukheun le Musa wahe ya Allah Lon takot sulet jipeugah keu lon Han jipateh lon jikheun beurakah
Seumpet dada lon han glah lidah lon Neukirem Harun lom Neuyue peugah
Dilon na salah pih bak awak nyan Takot jipoh lon jimeung tueng balah
Neukheun hana peue tajak bandua Ò Kamoe bri tanda nyang raya tuah Kamoe Meudeungo peue-peue nyang jikheun
Ubak Peuraʻeun keudeh tapeugah Kamoe nyoe Rasul Tuhan Po alam
Awak kamoe nyan Neuyue peuleupah Bani Israil tajok keu kamoe
Jiseuot meunoe laju jipeugah Kon gata dilee kamoe peulahra Yoh mantong gata si manyak mirah Padum thon sabe taduek ngon kamoe
Tapeubuet dudoe buet nyang that salah oi Dum guna kamoe hana tapike Tatem jak kaphe hana tapeugah
Geukheun buet lon nyan sabab meularat Watee nyan sisat lon ka roh salah
Nyankeuh jeuet lon plueng keudeh u lua Takot keu gata tameung tueng balah Teuma di sideh Tuhan bri keu lon Hikmah keu lon Neubri got leupah Neupeujeuet treuk lon keu Rasul Tuhan
Teuma nikmat nyan nyang gata peugah Tapeulahra lon yoh mantong ubit Ka tapeunamiet dum hamba Allah Bani Israil dum tapeunamiet Lalem that keubit elanya leupah
Peuraʻeun tanyong boh nyang toh Tuhan Nyang Po dum alam bunoe tapeugah
Geukheun Tuhan Po langet ngon bumoe Ngon bandum asoe bandum blah bicah Meu tatem pateh nyankeuh nyang Tuhan
Peuraʻeun jikheun bak ngon jih bagah Nyan na tadeungo roe gata bandum
Musa kheun Tuhan kuasa leupah Tuhan gata dum ngon yah-yah gata Nyang dilee masa dum ka beh leupah
Jikheun Rasul nyan nyang jak bak gata Jih nyan ka gila akai ka ubah
Geukheun Tuhan Po timu ngon barat Bandum lat batat peuneujeuet Allah Meunyo tapike ngon akai nyang got
Jikheun bek le that haba tapeugah Meu takheun tuhan laen nibak lon Gata lam palong keudeh kukeubah Dalam glap seupot kupasoe gata
Teuma kheun Musa deungo lon peugah Meunyo ek lon bri dali nyang nyata Teuma peue gata tatem meunyeurah
Jikheun jok keunoe dali bak gata Meunyo bit beuna lagee tapeugah
Geutiek treuk tungkat ka jeuet keu naga Uleue be raya nyata that leupah
Geusuet ngon jaroe puteh meukeuprak Soe nyang ngieng rusak mata jih mirah
Jikheun treuk laju bak rakan lingka Nyoe sihe raya carong jih leupah
Jimeung peuteubiet gata lam nanggroe Teuh ngon sihe nyoe gata jirajah Boh peue tapeugot teuma keu jih nyoe
Tayue preh jih nyoe teuma jipeugah Í Ngon aduen jih nyan tayue preh siat Ditanyoe rakyat jinoe dum takrah Ban saboh nanggroe meusapat keunoe
Sihe geutanyoe pih carong leupah d Sihe nyang utoh bandum tayue jak
Bandum treuk jijak keunan dum bagah Bak watee uroe nyang ka jimaklum
Jitanyong bandum ka troh talangkah
Mangat taikot bandum sihe nyan Meunyo ek meunang lagee jipeugah
‘Ohban troh keunan dum tukang sihe Ka jitanyong le jilakee upah Jilakee upah ubak Peuraʻeun Meu kamoe meunang peue na hadiah
Jikheun hadiah cit na keu gata Gata ngon raja lom toe that leupah
Geukheun le Musa boh tiek peue nyang na Nyang keunoe taba ‘oh Iheueh tarajah
Jitiek treuk taloe ngon tungkat jih dum Deumi Peuraʻeun raja nyang meugah Geutanyoe meunang meunan dum jikheun
Geutiek treuk keunan tungkat meutuah ‘Ohban ka geutiek tungkat le Musa Jiʻuet treuk sigra peue nyang meurimbah Abeh dum jiʻuet sihe awak nyan
Teukeujet yoh nyan tukang meurajah Si tukang sihe bandum jisujud Í Sabab teukeujet jikalon ulah
Jikheun treuk bandum kamoe meuiman Tuhan Po alam kuasa leupah
Tuhan Po Musa ngon Tuhan Harun

Beungeh Peuraʻeun jikheun treuk bagah Peue kameuiman laju keu jih nyan Gohlom kuizin le lon dum keu kah i Keubit gureekah jih nyang raya that Sihe dum meuhat jipeurunoe kah Nyoe beu kateupeue hukoman kubri Jaroe ngon gaki kukoh kutarah Jaroe ngon gaki kusurang sareng Lheueh nyan kupateng beu manyang leupah Bandum kuteupang u ateuh sula Nak bek biasa lawan peurintah
Seuot awak nyan hana meularat Kamoe dum meuhat meuwoe bak Allah Ubak Po kamoe keudeh dum muewoe
Neuampon kamoe meulakee bagah Raya that deecha kamoe baroekon Kamoe meuiman jinoe ya Allah Nyoekeuh dum kamoe nyang phon meuiman
